channel.title: I'm just starting out guys.. need a hand
channel.description:
ok guys i dont really know where to post this, but ill just post it here for now.
ok well i really want to get back into doing private servers again, only problem is, ive lost all the little knowledge i had of them, i dont know whats a good pk source to start from, what client to use, how to change the ip to mine etc, so yes, thats basically the 3 things i'm asking.
1. What is a good pk server to start from? (I want my server to be a pk one) 2. What client should i use? links for this and previous question! :D 3. How do i change the ip of a client to mine, where do i find GUI.java etc..
thanks! please dont flame for my noobiness lol i know i'm very stupid with servers but hopefully i can learn fast,as i'm recovering from spinal surgery.
thanks again

item.title: I'm just starting out guys.. need a hand
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Not a good section to post it in.
I suggest you download a basic source from the downloads section and just read some tutorials.

Read full topic
item.source: I'm just starting out guys.. need a hand
